## Quick install

We are actively developing rbims, so for now it is not available at CRAN or Biocondiuctor, however you can access to the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/mirnavazquez/RbiMs) like this:

Install devtools in the case you dont have it.

```{r install devtools, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
```

Install rbims.

```{r install rbims, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("mirnavazquez/RbiMs")
library(rbims)
```
